meanings.definition: Used for emphasis or to express surprise or disbelief.
meanings.sent1: Well, that was the goddamndest thing I've ever seen!
meanings.sent2: Oh goddamndest, I can't believe you did that!
meanings.sent3: When the cat started dancing, I just shouted 'goddamndest'!
meanings.sent4: The sudden rainstorm was the goddamndest surprise during the picnic.
meanings.sent5: His magic trick was the goddamndest moment of the show.

meanings.sent1: That was the goddamndest sandwich I've ever tasted!
meanings.sent2: She has the goddamndest luck with finding four-leaf clovers.
meanings.sent3: The goddamndest snowstorm hit right before the ski competition.
meanings.sent4: His goddamndest effort paid off with a perfect score.
meanings.sent5: The goddamndest roller coaster ride left everyone screaming with joy.
